item.title: Kelleya1 add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Kelleya1 add a quote by Brunonia Barry
item.description: "<em>I'll pit my God against your god</em> any day, I say to the Calvinists. It's not their god I'm praying to.... The God I'm praying to is neither male nor female. My God is the one who exists apart from all of men's agendas, the God who takes you away when there is no possible place you can go." -- Brunonia Barry

item.title: Kelleya1 add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "I have never listened to anyone who criticized my taste in space travel, sideshows or gorillas. When this occurs, I pack up my dinosaurs and leave the room." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Kelleya1 add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "I just saved your fucking life, Mom. . . . You could at least offer me an Oreo." -- Neal Stephenson
